p.text: The object will be displayed such text , which will be specified in this property.

p.textAll: Example the object Window text is its title, and the object text box is the text of the recorded it.

sample.sampletitle: Options for changing the text in the main window
sample.samplecode: Window1.Window1.Tekst = "New header text box Window1.Window1.Tekst =" New "&" header text box Window1.Window1.Tekst = Window1.Window1.Tekst&"<- text box Window1.Window1.Tekst = "width of the window:" ""&Window1.Window1.Shirina&""""

remarks.text: If the text you want to add quotes, it becomes a double repetition of the quotes within the text that you want to assign:
remarks.codesnip: "This is the text without quotation marks, and" here in quotation marks "". "

p.text: To insert newline (analog pressing Enter), use Auxiliary words -!> ;! Other , or insert a symbol "¶"
p.codesnip: Window1.Knopka1.Tekst = "text ¶ The text on a new line"
